Title: Repeals subdivision 15 of section 353 of the executive law relating to the duties of the state director of the division of veterans' affairs
Summary: Repeals provisions relating to the duties of the state director of the division of veterans' affairs; repeals provisions relating to reports on certain children of Vietnam veterans.
LawCode: Rpld §353 sub 15, Exec L; rpld §4402 sub 1 ¶b sub¶ 3 clause (h), Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 15 of section 353 of the executive law relating to the duties of the state director of the division of veterans' affairs; and to repeal clause (h) of subparagraph 3 of paragraph b of subdivision 1 of section 4402 of the education law relating to reports on certain children of Vietnam veterans
